content.xhtml:p:
Simulate incoming bottle states (okay or broken) & bottle sizes.
Bottle Detect (Bot_Detect_State): Present --> True (1) None --> False (0) Bottle State (Bot_State): Okay --> True (1) Broken --> False (0) Bottle Size (Bot_Size): Large --> True (1) Small --> False (0)
Fills the bottles depending on their sizes. (Waits for 0.5s then fills the bottles until full.)

Segregate bottles depending on their sizes.
Positions: Up --> Small Down --> Large
THIS SERVES AS THE MEMORY WHERE THE BITS ARE STORED.
Randomly generate bottles with specific sizes and states.
SR block is a latch that stores the output until reset or replaced.
Timer for the different stages of operation.
TON2 controls the feed motor activation which is activated every 1.2 seconds. (In refiling station, bottle stays in place for 0.5s then filling starts until full with maximum time of 0.7s.)
